name: ManaBox
description:
FEATURES:
- Powerful search with filters of all cards and sets, all offline
- Up to date prices from Cardmarket, TCGplayer, Card Kingdom and Cardhoarder
- Organize your decks, check its value and view multiple stats (Mana Curve, Mana Production...)
- Powerful deck simulator to test and improve your decks
- Complete card information with up to date rules and legalities
- Easily share cards with your friends
- Track your favorite cards
- Feed with multiple Magic the Gathering articles
- Trade tool

ManaBox is a companion tool for Magic: The Gathering (MTG) players. With ManaBox you can search through all cards and sets without exception for FREE. ManaBox allows you to access up to date market data from Cardmarket, TCGplayer and Card Kingdom so you always know the value of your cards or look at the prices of the cards you would like to get.

Keep all your decks organized inside the app and place them in folders if you prefer.

You can share any card you want with your friends as well as a link to the marketplace of your choice.

View any set and any card in MTG history, all in one app. The always up to date database means you will never miss any recently released set or card.

ManaBox includes a powerful trade tool that allows you to do better trades, faster and fairer. Search easily between different sets and choose the specific card version you want to trade.

We’re continuously working on improving the app, we’d love to hear your feedback and suggestions at feedback@skilldevs.com.


Prices are provided by Cardmarket.com, TCGplayer.com and CardKingdom.com.
Magic: The Gathering is copyrighted by Wizards of the Coast and ManaBox is not affiliated in any way with Wizards of the Coast nor Hasbro, Inc.

This app offers subscriptions. They're available (in USD) for $2.49 monthly or $22.99 yearly. ManaBox subscriptions will renew within 24 hours of the subscription period ending, and you will be charged through your iTunes account. Manage at any times through Account Settings in iTunes. Terms and Privacy Policy can be found at https://manabox.app/pages/termsofservice and https://manabox.app/privacy, respectively.
